title: The US Election By Numbers
content: Swing states, electoral college votes, candidates up and down the ballot, and millions of potential voters: Here is the US election, broken down by numbers.
summary: Swing states, electoral college votes, candidates up and down the ballot, and millions of potential voters: Here is the US election, broken down by numbers.

title: The Seven States That Will Decide The US Presidency
content: And in the handful of critical states framing the 2024 race, there is little daylight between the rivals with barely a week before Election Day.
summary: And in the handful of critical states framing the 2024 race, there is little daylight between the rivals with barely a week before Election Day.

title: Is The US Presidential Election A Battle Of The Sexes?
content: Historically speaking, women have leaned towards voting for Democrats more than men have, since the 1980s and this gap has only grown wider since.
summary: Historically speaking, women have leaned towards voting for Democrats more than men have, since the 1980s and this gap has only grown wider since.

title: Russia To Launch Two Private Iranian Satellites Into Orbit
content: A Russian rocket will launch two privately built Iranian satellites into orbit early Tuesday, the Iranian embassy in Moscow said, hailing close space cooperation between Moscow and Tehran.
summary: A Russian rocket will launch two privately built Iranian satellites into orbit early Tuesday, the Iranian embassy in Moscow said, hailing close space cooperation between Moscow and Tehran.

title: Trump Says He Would Not Mind Somebody 'Shooting' At Him Through Fake News
content: Having survived two assassination attempts this summer, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump on Sunday suggested that he would not mind if somebody took a shot at him through fake news.
summary: Having survived two assassination attempts this summer, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump on Sunday suggested that he would not mind if somebody took a shot at him through fake news.

title: "I'm A Product Of Poverty": Cardi B Slams Elon Musk Over 'Puppet' Remark
content: "Another puppet who can't even talk without being fed the words," Mr Musk said in a tweet.
summary: "Another puppet who can't even talk without being fed the words," Mr Musk said in a tweet.

title: Pak Ex PM Imran Khan's Wife Breaks Down In Tears During Court Proceedings
content: A court in Pakistan on Monday witnessed emotional scenes when jailed former premier Imran Khan's wife Bushra Bibi burst into tears, expressing her utter helplessness against the inefficient justice system and her husband's "unjust sentencing".
summary: A court in Pakistan on Monday witnessed emotional scenes when jailed former premier Imran Khan's wife Bushra Bibi burst into tears, expressing her utter helplessness against the inefficient justice system and her husband's "unjust sentencing".

title: Watch: Trump's Dance Moves On Hit Track 'YMCA' At Georgia Rally
content: Former US President and Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump capped off his rally in Georgia by dancing to the classic hit 'YMCA'.
summary: Former US President and Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump capped off his rally in Georgia by dancing to the classic hit 'YMCA'.

title: Iran Woman Who Stripped At University Not Seen Since. What We Know
content: Two days back, a young Iranian woman took the Internet by storm when she stripped to her underwear on a Tehran university campus, apparently to protest against the country's strict dress code for women.
summary: Two days back, a young Iranian woman took the Internet by storm when she stripped to her underwear on a Tehran university campus, apparently to protest against the country's strict dress code for women.

title: US Police Arrest Suspect In Murder Case Initially Mistaken For Bear Attack
content: No motive for the attack has yet been identified, Gallatin County Sheriff said in a statement.

title: "Deeply Concerned About Indians' Safety": Government On Canada Temple Attack
content: India on Monday said it "condemns acts of violence perpetrated by extremists and separatists", referring to an incident at a Hindu temple in Brampton, in the Canadian province of Ontario, last week.
summary: India on Monday said it "condemns acts of violence perpetrated by extremists and separatists", referring to an incident at a Hindu temple in Brampton, in the Canadian province of Ontario, last week.

title: How Pennsylvania Holds The Key To US Election: 10 Points
content: Votes in the US state of Pennsylvania hold the power to make or break the chances of entering the White House for both Donald Trump and Kamala Harris. Pennsylvania holds 19 electoral votes. It was pivotal for the Democrats win in the 2020 election.
summary: Votes in the US state of Pennsylvania hold the power to make or break the chances of entering the White House for both Donald Trump and Kamala Harris. Pennsylvania holds 19 electoral votes. It was pivotal for the Democrats win in the 2020 election.

title: This Is The World's Most Polluted City, 6 Times Worse Than Delhi
content: The Air Quality Index in Pakistan's Lahore stood at 1,900, its highest ever, prompting the country to write a letter to the Indian government to open a dialogue on the issue.
summary: The Air Quality Index in Pakistan's Lahore stood at 1,900, its highest ever, prompting the country to write a letter to the Indian government to open a dialogue on the issue.

title: First Person Who Died In Sarco Suicide Pod May Have Been Strangled: Report
content: The first documented case of a woman using the Sarco "suicide pod" in Switzerland has taken a new turn. An autopsy reportedly found strangulation marks on her neck, sparking speculations about her death.
summary: The first documented case of a woman using the Sarco "suicide pod" in Switzerland has taken a new turn. An autopsy reportedly found strangulation marks on her neck, sparking speculations about her death.

title: Malaysian Teen Dies From Electrocution While Charging Phone On Bus
content: According to the bus driver, the victim appeared to have suffered a severe electric shock, with burn marks visible on the fingers of his left hand.

title: COP29: Nations Gather For Crunch Climate Talks In Shadow Of US Election
content: The stakes are high for the COP29 conference in Azerbaijan where nations must agree a new target to fund climate action across huge swathes of the world.

title: Why Democrats And Republicans Are The Only Two Dominant Parties In US
content: For much of its history, the political landscape of the United States has seen two dominant forces: the Democrats and Republicans and it has continued since the mid-1800s.
summary: For much of its history, the political landscape of the United States has seen two dominant forces: the Democrats and Republicans and it has continued since the mid-1800s.

title: Trump Claims Pennsylvania Vote Fraud As Harris Stumps In Michigan
content: Donald Trump doubled down Sunday on his baseless predictions of voter fraud in battleground states as he and rival Kamala Harris launched their frantic final 48 hours of campaigning to court the last holdouts in a bitterly contested US election.
summary: Donald Trump doubled down Sunday on his baseless predictions of voter fraud in battleground states as he and rival Kamala Harris launched their frantic final 48 hours of campaigning to court the last holdouts in a bitterly contested US election.

title: Mud Hits Spanish King, Queen In Face As Crowd Protests Flood Crisis
content: Furious locals hurled mud and insults at Spain's king, queen and prime minister on Sunday in a startling show of anger in the worst hit town in the flood disaster that has killed more than 210 people.
summary: Furious locals hurled mud and insults at Spain's king, queen and prime minister on Sunday in a startling show of anger in the worst hit town in the flood disaster that has killed more than 210 people.

title: US Man Who Claimed To Be Hamas Operative Arrested For Hate Crimes
